Package com.endava.endavibe.log.answerLog

Interface AnswerLogRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<AnswerLogEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<AnswerLogEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<AnswerLogEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<AnswerLogEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<AnswerLogEntity,Long>
public interface AnswerLogRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<AnswerLogEntity,Long>

  • Method Details

    • findAllAnswersGroupByProjectAndQuestionCategory

      @Query("SELECT new com.endava.endavibe.common.dto.stats.AnswerStatDto(ale.projectId, ale.questionCategoryId, AVG(ale.answerValue), COUNT(ale.answerValue), MIN(ale.insDate), MAX(ale.insDate)) FROM AnswerLogEntity ale GROUP BY ale.projectId, ale.questionCategoryId") List<AnswerStatDto> findAllAnswersGroupByProjectAndQuestionCategory()
      Returns:
      all logs grouped as stats

    • findAllAnswersGroupByProjectAndQuestionCategoryAfter

      @Query("SELECT new com.endava.endavibe.common.dto.stats.AnswerStatDto(ale.projectId, ale.questionCategoryId, AVG(ale.answerValue), COUNT(ale.answerValue), MIN(ale.insDate), MAX(ale.insDate)) FROM AnswerLogEntity ale WHERE ale.insDate > :startDate GROUP BY ale.projectId, ale.questionCategoryId") List<AnswerStatDto> findAllAnswersGroupByProjectAndQuestionCategoryAfter(LocalDateTime startDate)
      Parameters:
      startDate - is the starting point of processing stats from Answers logs
      Returns:
      stats from a given date to the most recent date based on logs

    • findAllAnswersGroupByProjectAndQuestionCategoryBetween

      @Query("SELECT new com.endava.endavibe.common.dto.stats.AnswerStatDto(ale.projectId, ale.questionCategoryId, AVG(ale.answerValue), COUNT(ale.answerValue), MIN(ale.insDate), MAX(ale.insDate)) FROM AnswerLogEntity ale WHERE ale.insDate > :startDate AND ale.insDate < :endDate GROUP BY ale.projectId, ale.questionCategoryId") List<AnswerStatDto> findAllAnswersGroupByProjectAndQuestionCategoryBetween(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Parameters:
      startDate - is the starting point of processing stats from Answers logs
      endDate - is the end point of processing stats from Answers logs
      Returns:
      stats from a given interval
